ygData.subject: RE: Lighstones was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope, and plus it works a lot better than the spell form of Levitate too, in that it continuously elevates you to a point. (OT) ... Networker across a farm
ygData.messageBody:
>And so noone crucify's me too bad for non-bardic posting..
>I have a question about the Level 31 Levitation spell.
>Does it require bat wings to sing?

Nope, and plus it works a lot better than the spell form of
Levitate too, in that it continuously elevates you to a point.

(OT)

>Would be interested to know what software you use.

Networker across a farm of Sun / Digital servers.
Our company hosts various large newspaper websites.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th 'Lt Dag hits YOU for 350 damage'.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
